approach_summary: Added __eq__ and __hash__ methods to Todo dataclass to enable equality comparison and set/dict operations based on id field
lint_command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_3030_todo_eq_hash.py

implementation_details.eq_method: Returns True if other is a Todo with same id, NotImplemented otherwise
implementation_details.hash_method: Returns hash of the id field for consistency with __eq__

acceptance_criteria_met: Todo(id=1, text='a') == Todo(id=1, text='b') returns True
len(set([Todo(id=1, text='a'), Todo(id=1, text='b')])) == 1 works correctly
risks: None identified. The implementation is minimal and only affects equality and hashing behavior.
limitations: None. This is a straightforward enhancement.
